Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 isravel Puththirar Nimiththam Meedhiyaaniyaridaththil Pazhivaanguvaayaaga; Adhanpinbu Un Janaththaaridaththil Serkkappaduvaai Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Mose Janangalai Nokki: Karththar Nimiththam Meedhiyaaniyaridaththil Pazhivaangumporuttu, Ungalil Avargalmel Yuththaththirkup Pogaththakkadhaaga Manidharaip Piriththedungal.
4 israveludaiya Ellaak Koththirangalilum Ovvoru Koththiraththil Aayiramperai Yuththaththirku Anuppavendum Endraan.
5 appadiye Isravelaraagiya Anegam Aayirangalil, Ovvoru Koththiraththil Aayiramaayiram Peraagap Panneeraayiramper Yuththasannaththaraai Niruththappattaargal.
6 mose Avargalaiyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasarin Kumaaran Pinekaasaiyum Yuththaththirku Anuppugaiyil, Avan Kaiyile Parisuththa Thattumuttugalaiyum, Thonikkum Poorikaigalaiyum Koduththu Anuppinaan.
7 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Avargal Meedhiyaaniyarudan Yuththampanni, Purushargal Yaavaraiyum Kondrupottaargal.

8 avargalaik Kondrupottadhumandri, Meedhiyaaniyarin Aindhu Raajaakkalaagiya Evi, Rekkem, Soor, Oor, Repaa Enbavargalaiyum Kondrupottaargal. Peyorin Kumaaranaagiya Pileyaamaiyum Pattayaththinaale Kondrupottaargal.
9 andriyum Isravel Puththirar Meedhiyaaniyarin Sthreegalaiyum Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Siraipidiththu, Avargaludaiya Mirugajeevangalaagiya Aadumaadugal Yaavaiyum, Matra Aasthigal Yaavaiyum Kollaiyittu,
10 avargal Kudiyirundha Oorgal Kottaigal Yaavaiyum Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu,
11 thaangal Kollaiyitta Porulaiyum Thaangal Pidiththa Narajeevan Mirugajeevan Anaiththaiyum Serththu,

12 siraipidikkappatta Manidharaiyum, Mirugangalaiyum, Kollaiyitta Porulgalaiyum Erigovin Arugeyulla Yordhaanukku Ikkaraiyil Movaapin Samanaana Veligalilulla Paalayaththilirundha Moseyinidaththukkum, Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarinidaththukkum, Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaaridaththukkum Konduvandhaargal.
13 moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Sabaiyin Prabukkal Ellaarum Avargalai Sandhikkap Paalayaththirku Veliye Purappattupponaargal.
14 appozhudhu Mose Yuththaththilirundhu Vandha Aayiramperukkuth Thalaivarum, Nooruperukkuth Thalaivarumaagiya Senaapadhigalmel Kobankondu,
15 avargalai Nokki: Sthreegal Ellaaraiyum Uyirode Vittuvitteergalaa?

16 peyorin Sangadhiyile Pileyaamin Aalosanaiyinaal Isravel Puththirar Karththarukku Virodhamaai Dhrogampannak Kaaranamaayirundhavargal Ivargaldhaane; Adhinaal Karththarin Sabaiyile Vaadhaiyum Nerittadhe.
17 aagaiyaal Kuzhandhaigalil Ellaa Aanpillaigalaiyum, Purushasamyokaththai Arindha Ellaa Sthreegalaiyum Kondrupodungal.
18 sthreegalil Purushasamyokaththai Ariyaadha Ellaap Penpillaigalaiyum Ungalukkaaga Uyirode Vaiyungal.

19 pinbu Neengal Ezhunaal Paalayaththirkup Purambe Thangungal; Narajeevanaik Kondravargalum, Vettundavarlaith Thottavargalumaagiya Neengal Yaavarum Moondraam Naalilum Ezhaam Naalilum Ungalaiyum Ungalaal Siraipidikkappattavargalaiyum Suththigariththu,
20 andhappadiye Ellaa Vasthiraththaiyum, Tholaal Seydha Karuvigalaiyum, Vellaattumayirinaal Neydhavaigalaiyum, Marachchaamaangalaiyum Suththigarikkakkadaveergal Endraan.
21 aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Yuththaththirkup Poivandha Padaiveerarai Nokki: Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyitta Vidhippramaanam Ennavendraal:
22 akkinikku Nirkaththakkavaigalaagiya Pon, Velli, Vengalam, Irumbu, Thagaram, Eeyam Aagiya Ivaigalellaam Suththamaagumpadikku,
23 avaigalai Akkiniyile Pottedukkakkadaveergal; Theettukkazhikkum Thanneeraalum Avaigal Suththigarikkappadavendum; Akkinikku Nirkaththagaadhavaigalaiyellaam Thanneerinaal Suththampannakkadaveergal.
24 ezhaam Naalil Ungal Vasthirangalaith Thoikkavendum; Appozhudhu Suththamaayiruppeergal; Pinbu Neengal Paalayaththirkul Varalaam Endraan.
25 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
26 pidiththukkondu Varappatta Manidharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Neeyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Sabaiyinudaiya Pidhaakkalaagiya Thalaivarum Thogaipaarththu,
27 kollaiyidappattadhai Irandu Pangaagap Pangittu, Yuththaththirkup Padaiyeduththupponavargalukkum Sabaiyanaiththirkum Kodungal.
28 melum Yuththaththirkuppona Padaiveeraridaththil Karththarukkaaga Manidharilum Maadugalilum Kazhudhaigalilum Aadugalilum Ainnootrirku Oru Praani Veedhamaaga Pagudhi Vaangi,
29 avargaludaiya Paadhippangil Eduththu, Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Padaippaaga Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkuk Kodukkavendum.

30 isravel Puththirarin Paadhippangilo Manidharilum, Maadugal Kazhudhaigal Aadugalaagiya Sagalavidha Mirugangalilum, Aimbadhirku Ondru Veedhamaai Vaangi Avaigalaik Karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththin Kaavalaikkaakkum Leviyarukkuk Kodukkavendum Endraar.
31 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Seydhaargal.
32 padaiveerar Kollaiyitta Porulil, Aarulatchaththu Ezhubaththaiyaayiram Aadugalum,
33 ezhubaththeeraayiram Maadugalum,
34 arubaththoraayiram Kazhudhaigalum Meedhiyaayirundhadhu.
35 purushasamyokaththai Ariyaadha Sthreekalil Muppaththeeraayiramper Irundhaargal.
36 yuththancheyyap Ponavargalukkuk Kidaiththa Paadhippangin Thogaiyaavadhu: Aadugal Moondrulatchaththu Muppaththezhaayiraththu Ainnooru.
37 indha Aadugalile Karththarukkup Pagudhiyaaga Vandhadhu Arunootru Ezhubaththaindhu.
38 maadugal Muppaththaaraayiram; Avaigalil Karththarukkup Pagudhiyaaga Vandhadhu Ezhubaththirandu.
39 kazhudhaigal Muppadhinaayiraththu Ainnooru; Avaigalil Karththarukkup Pagudhiyaaga Vandhadhu Arubaththondru.
40 narajeevangal Padhinaaraayiram Per; Avargalil Karththarukkup Pagudhiyaaga Vandhavargal Muppaththiranduper.
41 karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Andhap Pagudhiyai, Mose Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaaridaththil Koduththaan.
42 yuththampannina Pergalukkum Isravel Puththirarukkum Mose Paadhipaadhiyaagap Pangittadhinpadiye Sabaiyaarukku Vandha Paadhippangaavadhu:
43 aadugalil Mundrulatchaththu Muppaththezhaayiraththu Ainnooru,
44 maadugalil Muppaththaaraayiram,
45 kazhudhaigalil Muppadhinaayiraththu Ainnooru,
46 narajeevangalil Padhinaayiram Perume.

47 isravel Puththirarin Paadhippangukku Vandha Indha Narajeevangalilum Mirugangalilum Mose Aimbadhukku Ondru Veedhamaaga Eduththu, Avaigalaik Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththin Kaavalaik Kaakkira Leviyarukkuk Koduththaan.
48 pinbu Aayiramperukkuth Thalaivarum Nooruperukkuth Thalaivarumaana Senaapadhigal Moseyinidaththil Vandhu,
49 umadhu Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangal Engal Kaiyin Keezhirukkira Yuththamanidharaith Thogaipaarththom; Avargalukkulle Oru Aalum Kuraiyavillai.

50 aagaiyaal, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Engal Aaththumaakkalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumporuttu, Engalukkuk Kidaiththa Porpanigalaagiya Paadhasarangalaiyum, Asthakadagangalaiyum, Modhirangalaiyum, Kaadhanigalaiyum, Kaappugalaiyum Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvandhom Endraargal.
51 appozhudhu Moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Sagalavidha Velaippaadaana Panidhigalaana Andhap Ponnaabaranangalai Avargalidaththil Vaanginaargal.

52 ippadi Aayiramperukkuth Thalaivaraanavargalaalum Nooruperukkuth Thalaivaraanavargalaalum Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Kaanikkaiyaaga Seluththappatta Pon Muzhuvadhum Padhinaaraayiraththu Ezhunootru Aimbadhu Sekkal Niraiyaayirundhadhu.
53 yuththaththirkup Pona Manidhar Ovvoruvarum Thangal Thangalukkaagak Kollaiyittirundhaargal.

54 andhap Ponnai Moseyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum Aayiramperukkuth Thalaivaraanavargalin Kaiyilum, Nooruperukkuth Thalaivaraanavargalin Kaiyilum Vaangi, Isravel Puththirarukku Gnaabagakkuriyaaga Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Karththarudaiyasannidhiyil Konduvandhu Vaiththaargal.
